salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 (Junior Officer) to LKR 400,000+ (Ministry Secretary/Ambassador) per month.
futureOutlook: Joining premier services like the SLAS or SLFS is one of the most prestigious career paths in Sri Lanka. The recruitment exams are extremely competitive with very few vacancies. However, for those who succeed, it offers a unique opportunity to be involved in national governance and policymaking at the highest levels.
